programmes.show_description: DJ SHIVXNI is taking over the mix this week! She's bringing nothing but those good anthems to get you stepping.
SAIKAT is stepping into the Desi Dancefloor Mix and blending the slickest sounds.
Roses are dead, Violets ain't blue, Manara says the music sounds better with YOU! Lock in for a three-hour deep dig of the best UKG, house and Asian sensations. Contains strong language.
Get ready for a feel-good Pure Spice Takeover as DJ Ishu jumps on the decks. Expect a joyful blend of Asian beats mixed with disco grooves, pop favourites and global sounds. Contains strong language.
Nonstop Asian Network bangers!

programmes.show_name: The Everyday Hustle with Harleen Nottay
programmes.show_description: Sonia Sabri, who runs her own South Asian dance and music company, joins Harleen Nottay to discuss how she became a successful entrepreneur in the arts world.

programmes.show_name: The Everyday Hustle with Harleen Nottay
programmes.show_description: Fashion designer, Jashaan Gill joins Harleen Nottay to discuss launching his business Jheez in 2014 and how he became the first British Punjabi to headline New York Fashion Week.

programmes.show_name: Asian Network Motivation with Sarover Aulja
programmes.show_description: Life doesn't always follow the script. Sarover opens up about heartbreak, reinvention and finding purpose. When plans fall apart, maybe they fall into place.

programmes.show_name: Asian Network Breakfast with Bobby Friction
programmes.show_description: Bobby Friction wakes you up the right way with Meesha Shafi, Raf Saperra and Payal Dev. Plus, plays a game of Guess the Gibberish. Can you guess the track?

programmes.show_name: Asian Network Certified with Bobby Friction
programmes.show_description: Bobby Friction brings the Asian Network Certified mix to start your weekend. A selection of fresh tracks and sing-along anthems for you this Saturday!
Vallisa has got big tunes for your Saturday, plus can you crack the Popcorn Puzzle? You're the DJ before 12 with This or That, but which Shahid Kapoor track will you pick?

programmes.show_name: Asian Network Certified Throwbacks with Vallisa
programmes.show_description: Lady Gaga to Lata Mangeshkar, Gupsy Aujla to Gwen Stefani - Throwbacks in the mix! Bollywood, Bhangra, hip-hop, R&B, UK garage and British Asian beats all mashed up!
Shankeya sits in. In the spirit of Ramadan, we're exploring small acts of kindness. What good deeds do you practise weekly? Join us and share how giving back makes a difference.
AJD sits in for Kizzi soundtracking your Saturday nights with the biggest and best tunes, Asian anthems and mixes.
Pay close attention, Manara's taking you to another dimension. Lock in for a three-hour rollercoaster ride through classics, brand-new bubblers and all things nice. Contains strong language.
DJ Ishu gets into her Garage and Grime bag for this week's Pure Spice Takeover. Contains strong language.
DJ Kizzi soundtracks your Saturday nights with the biggest and best tunes, Asian anthems and mixes.

programmes.show_name: Asian Network's Club Hit Squad Mix
programmes.show_description: Love is in the air... and so is the bass. Dee and Rav are setting the mood this Valentine's, delivering a soundtrack smoother than Usher.

programmes.show_name: Asian Network's Club Hit Squad Mix
programmes.show_description: Panjabi Hit Squad are stepping into the Club Hit Squad experience with a 30-minute mix bringing championship energy straight to your speakers. It's the ultimate face-off UK vs US.
Gagan Grewal pays tribute to the legendary Sridevi - the queen of grace, glamour and groundbreaking Bollywood performances!
Vallisa brings you Bollywood Companions, a beautiful collection of iconic tracks that all have the word Saathiya in common.
Gagan Grewal brings you Bollywood From The Heart, where Dil does all the talking! From emotional favourites like Dil Kehtha hai to timeless hits like Dil Ne Yeh Kaha Hai Dil Se.
Nonstop Asian Network banger from the likes of King, Ezu & Jasmine Walia!

programmes.show_name: Asian Network Breakfast with Bobby Friction
programmes.show_description: Ease into Sunday with Bobby Friction. From warm classics to the freshest tunes, Bobby keeps your morning relaxed.
...Throwbacks with Bobby Friction. Rewind with Bobby Friction and 60 minutes of Asian Network Certified Throwbacks. A morning of classic tracks and fan favourites guaranteed to spark memories.
Listen to the best music from yesteryear as Vallisa takes you down memory lane with classic hits from Bollywood.
Tune in to Asian Network Celebrates Shahid Kapoor with Vallisa, a special show dedicated to the Bollywood star's career and best tracks!

programmes.show_name: Asian Network Punjabi with Dipps Bhamrah
programmes.show_description: Dipps dives into the crates and brings you a handpicked selection of Bhangra anthems, the kind that instantly take you back and make you say... What a tune!
...Entertainment Show with Nadia Ali. Nadia plays the best in Bengali music, as we remember Language Movement Day.
...Entertainment Show with Kan D Man. Pakistani music, entertainment and news with Kan D Man.
...and Tamil Entertainment Show with Pritt. Sundays are all about the latest South Indian, Sri Lankan and Tamil beats with the one and only Pritt.
Bobby revisits Lahore by Guru Randhawa in Schooling the Nation. Contains strong language.
Shankeya and Pritt share their unpopular opinions that they will defend til the end! Are long voicenotes severely underrated...or are they overrated?!
SMASHBengali is joined by Shankeya, in for Gura and is tested on her Spice Girl knowledge! Contains some strong language and adult humour.
